p: All animal trials were conducted in accordance with the recommendations and guidelines of the Egyptian Animal Welfare Legislation. The ethics committee of the National Research Centre, Egypt, approved the animal trial in mice (Approval code: 16-247). All experiments with infectious virus were performed according to Egyptian regulations for the propagation of influenza viruses. All experiments involving low pathogenic and highly pathogenic avian influenza A viruses were performed in biosafety level 2 and 3 (BSL2, 3) containment cabinets, respectively, approved for such use by the local authorities.
